Message.Text: Ugh, Frank, can you believe these students are using Snapchat to share their code? It makes no sense.
Tommy, they’re not using Snapchat. It’s Discord. You’ve got it wrong.
Come on, Frank, I know what I heard! Snapchat. Why would they even pick that?
It’s Discord, not Snapchat! You’re getting it mixed up.
Whatever. Snapchat, Discord... it’s annoying. Why do they have to keep using these random apps?
Because Discord’s perfect for coding. But it’s not Snapchat! Stop fixating on that.
I’m not fixating. I just wish they used something straightforward instead of Snapchat.
